title: Pokhara Complete Experience – 5 Days
description: A 5-day curated journey in and around Pokhara. From sunrise at Sarangkot and lake adventures to caves, cultural gems, and nearby hidden escapes like Begnas and Kusma, this package offers couples and explorers a perfect mix of leisure, thrill, and discovery. Experience the best of Pokhara with scenic flights, spiritual sites, adventure activities, and local cultural immersion.
highlights: Scenic domestic flights with stunning Himalayan mountain views during takeoff and landing
Romantic hilltop resort experience in Sarangkot with panoramic Annapurna range vistas
Guided spiritual tours to World Peace Stupa and impressive Pumdikot Shiva Statue
Flexible lake activities including Phewa Lake boating and serene Begnas Lake exploration
Morning ultralight flight or optional paragliding over Pokhara valley
Adventure day at Kusma with sky bridge walk, bungee, or swing options
Cultural immersion at Majhikuna village with local fish dishes
Cave exploration at Davis Falls and Gupteswor Cave
inclusions: Private ground transportation (Kathmandu ↔ Pokhara if by road, or airport transfers if by flight)
4 nights accommodation in Pokhara lakeside hotel
Lunch on Day 1 (if traveling by road)
Davis Falls & Gupteswor Cave entrance fees
Kusma Sky Bridge walk entry fee
All permits and entrance fees mentioned
exclusions: Optional activities: bungee jump, swing, paragliding
Personal expenses (shopping, laundry, phone calls, etc.)

itinerary.title: Kathmandu → Pokhara
itinerary.description: Arrive in Pokhara by scenic domestic flight (25 minutes) or drive (6-7 hours) with stunning Himalayan views during takeoff and landing. Check into your lakeside hotel and settle in. Evening at leisure with optional lakeside walk along the vibrant Lakeside area, café hopping, or simply relaxing by Phewa Lake. The evening is perfect for acclimatizing to Pokhara's serene atmosphere. Overnight in Pokhara.

itinerary.title: Pokhara Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Early morning drive to Sarangkot (1,592m) for a breathtaking sunrise over the Annapurna range, Dhaulagiri, and Machhapuchhre (Fishtail) mountain. After sunrise, visit the sacred Bindabasini Temple, one of the oldest temples in Pokhara. Continue to Davis Falls (Patale Chhango) and explore the mysterious Gupteswor Cave with its impressive limestone formations. Evening visit to World Peace Stupa or Pumdikot Shiva Temple for sunset views over Pokhara valley. Return to hotel for overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Pokhara Adventure Day
itinerary.description: Morning ultralight flight (30 minutes) over Pokhara valley for aerial views of the Himalayas and lakes, or opt for paragliding for a more adventurous experience. After breakfast, drive to Kusma (2 hours) for sky bridge walk experience - one of the world's highest suspension bridges. Optional activities include bungee jumping or swing for thrill-seekers. The sky bridge offers spectacular views of the Kaligandaki River gorge. Return to Pokhara in the evening. Overnight in Pokhara.

itinerary.title: Begnas & Local Culture
itinerary.description: Morning drive to Begnas Lake (15 km from Pokhara), a pristine and less crowded alternative to Phewa Lake. Enjoy peaceful boating on the crystal-clear waters surrounded by lush hills. Visit Majhikuna village for authentic cultural experience and taste local fish dishes prepared in traditional style. Interact with local communities and learn about their lifestyle. Afternoon return to Pokhara for leisure time in Lakeside cafés, shopping for souvenirs, or simply relaxing by Phewa Lake. Overnight in Pokhara.

itinerary.title: Pokhara → Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Free morning in Pokhara for last-minute shopping at Lakeside markets, final lakeside walk, or relaxing at your hotel. Visit local shops for handicrafts, pashmina, or trekking gear. Check out from hotel and transfer to Pokhara airport for flight back to Kathmandu (25 minutes) or begin drive back to Kathmandu (6-7 hours). Trip concludes with drop-off at your Kathmandu hotel or Tribhuvan International Airport as per your requirement.

faqs.question: Can this cultural itinerary be customized according to my preferences?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We offer flexible options including choice between flight or drive to Pokhara, extended stays for relaxation, upgraded accommodation standards, additional cultural sites, optional adventure activities like paragliding, or photography-focused extensions with professional guidance.

faqs.question: What specific items are included and excluded from the package price?
faqs.answer: Included are accommodation, daily breakfast, specified lunches, ground transportation, guided sightseeing tours, entrance fees to mentioned sites, Kusma sky bridge entry, and boating experiences. Excluded are domestic flights (optional), dinners, beverages, personal expenses, tips, optional activities, and travel insurance.

faqs.question: What is the cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Cancellations made 5 days before departure receive full refund (minus processing fees), 50% refund for cancellations within 2-4 days, and no refund for cancellations less than 1 day before departure. Flight-dependent packages subject to airline cancellation policies.

faqs.question: What is the best time for this cultural experience?
faqs.answer: The optimal time is September to May when weather is pleasant for sightseeing, clear mountain views are guaranteed for sunrise experiences, and comfortable temperatures make cultural exploration and outdoor activities most enjoyable throughout the day.
